description:
Infotreasury Response Error System for C# .NET CORE 6 API.

This package can be used to handle errors. It has three methods, used to:

1 - Add errors to a Response List.
2 - Return the error list.
3 - Clear the error list.

This package is used by the package Infotreasury.Library.Validation.

This package is still in development phase.
releaseNotes:
Added nuget package Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions
Added nuget package Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting
Added nuget package Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions

Creation of IMainCreateError

Methods:

1 - CreateErrorDatabase()       [Repository error]

Parameters For Each Enum Member (ErrorTypeDatabase)
• NotFound            - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.NotFound | optionalKey — Primary Key(s) of Entity]
• NotFoundAll     - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.NotFoundAll | optionalPluralItems — Entity Plural Name]
• Connection     - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.Connection]
• NoChanges         - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.NoChanges | optionalSinglelItem - Entity Single Name]
• ExistingKey          - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.ExistingKey | optionalKey — Primary Key(s) of Entity]
• ExistingDependency   - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.ExistingDependencY | optionalSinglelItem - Entity Single Name]


2 - CreateErrorValidation()    [MainValidation Error]

Parameters For Each Enum Member (ErrorTypeValidation)
• Type     - [ErrorTypeValidation.Type | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalVariableType - type of variable ]
• StringNumber    - [ErrorTypeValidation.StringNumber | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalMaxNumber - Max number | optionalMinNumber - MinNumber ]
• DateTime    - [ErrorTypeValidation.DateTime | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalMaxDate - Max Date | optionalMinDate - Min Date]
• Empty     - [ErrorTypeValidation.Empty | optionalFieldName - name of Field]
• Regex     - [ErrorTypeValidation. Regex | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalRegexItem - Name of Regex validation item]
• ValidationNumberParameters  - [ErrorTypeValidation.ValidationNumberParameters | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalMaxNumber - Max number | optionalMinNumber - MinNumber ]
• EmptySpaceValidation   - [ErrorTypeValidation.EmptySpaceValidation | optionalFieldName - name of Field]
• EmptyStringValidation   - [ErrorTypeValidation.EmptyStringValidation | optionalFieldName - name of Field]
• PrecisionAndScaleValidation  - [ErrorTypeValidation.PrecisionAndScaleValidation | optionalFieldName - name of Field | optionalScale - Scale of number | precision - precision of number ]

3 - CreateErrorDataBaseValidation().  [DatabaseValidation Error]

Parameters For Each Enum Member (ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation)
• ForeignKeyNotFound   - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.ForeignKeyNotFound | optionalForeignKeyName - ForeignKeyName | optionalTableName - Name of table]
• FlagAndProductNotFound  - [ErrorTypeDatabaseValidation.FlagAndProductNotFound | optionalFlagAndProduct - numeroFlag and numeroProduto in one string]

4 - CreateErrorException()   [Exception Error]

Parameters For Each Enum Member (ErrorTypeException)
• ExceptionDataBaseValidation  - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName]
• ExceptionValidation   - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName]
• ExceptionRepository   - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName | optionalSourceName - source code of error]
• ExceptionService    - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName | optionalSourceName - source code of error]
• ExceptionController   - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName | optionalSourceName - source code of error]
• ExceptionGeneric   - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName]
• ExceptionCommit    - [ErrorTypeException | exception - exception | methodName - MethodName]

5 - ReturnList()
6 - ClearErrorList()
title: Infotreasury Response Error System for C# .NET CORE 7 API
